mapper.select: SELECT ST.STOCK_CNT, ING.ING_NM FROM STOCK AS ST JOIN INGREDIENT AS ING ON ING.ING_CD = ST.ING_CD
SELECT s.MENU_CD, SUM(s.SELL_CNT) AS sell_CNT, m.MENU_NAME FROM SELL s LEFT JOIN MENU m ON s.MENU_CD=m.MENU_CD GROUP BY MENU_CD;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SELL_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS sell_Date, SUM(s.SELL_CNT*m.MENU_SP) AS total_SP FROM SELL s LEFT JOIN MENU m ON s.MENU_CD=m.MENU_CD GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(SELL_DATE, '%Y-%m');

SELECT HOUR(SELL_DATE) AS hour, SUM(s.SELL_CNT*m.MENU_SP) AS total_SP, m.MENU_NAME, s.SELL_CNT as SELL_CNT FROM SELL s LEFT JOIN MENU m ON s.MENU_CD=m.MENU_CD WHERE SELL_date > (NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY hour(SELL_DATE) ORDER BY SELL_DATE DESC;
